item.title: 根据纽约警察局的调查，哈里王子和苏塞克斯公爵夫人梅根在纽约市的追车事件涉及狗仔队的 "鲁莽 "行为。
item.description:

item.title: 加里-西尼斯（Gary Sinise）正在纪念他已故的儿子麦坎娜-安东尼-"麦克"-西尼斯（McCanna Anthony "Mac" Sinise），他于 1 月 5 日死于一种名为脊索瘤的罕见癌症。享年 33 岁。
item.description:
Gary Sinise is honoring his late son McCanna Anthony "Mac" Sinise, who died Jan. 5 from a rare form of cancer called chordoma. He was 33.https://t.co/lQVAjAcDyk pic.twitter.com/8VuIXqskM3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 当 @SelinaWangTV 问及拜登总统是否在年度体检中进行了认知测试时，白宫新闻秘书卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）说："他的医生，包括神经科医生，都认为他不需要测试。卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）说："他的医生，包括神经科医生，都认为他不需要。""这是他们的评估。"
item.description:
When asked by @SelinaWangTV if Pres. Biden took a cognitive test as part of his annual physical, White House press sec. Karine Jean-Pierre says, "His doctor, including the neurologist, do not believe that he needs one."

"That is their assessment." https://t.co/Fpiz54Fcnx pic.twitter.com/sIM280dXlu

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 28, 2024

item.title: 检察官指控一家虚假的安全学校向数千名纽约市建筑工人颁发假证书。
item.description:
Prosecutors allege a sham safety school gave bogus certifications to thousands of New York City construction workers.

The company and six of its executives are facing charges. https://t.co/2rMcPIq0uK pic.twitter.com/sIntjiyOrO

item.title: 温迪快餐连锁店（Wendy's）在宣布投资菜单板后，对有关该连锁店将提高价格的报道进行了反击。
item.description:
Wendy's is pushing back on reports that the fast-food chain will be increasing prices after announcing it would invest in menu boards that could have the ability to introduce dynamic or surge pricing. https://t.co/irUFQ7a5UX pic.twitter.com/5mNxicubun

item.title: 下个月的同一个周末将举行汽车行业最盛大的两场活动，但事实上，汽车发烧友可能不得不在这两场活动中做出选择，这让汽车发烧友群体产生了分歧。
item.description:
Two of the auto industry's flashiest events are taking place next month on the same weekend — but the fact that gearheads may be forced to choose between them has divided the enthusiast community. https://t.co/lwhhOW6WQP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国电影艺术与科学学院（Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences）表示，第 96 届奥斯卡金像奖颁奖典礼上将展示获得最佳原创歌曲类提名的全部 5 首歌曲。瑞恩-高斯林也将在 2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼上登台表演。
item.description:
The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences says that all 5 songs nominated in the best original song category will be showcased during the 96th Academy Awards. Ryan Gosling is among those who will take to the stage to perform during the 2024 Oscars. https://t.co/JCfYfA90dY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 德克萨斯州一名囚犯长期以来一直说自己是无辜的，并声称 20 多年前对他的定罪是基于虚假证词和可疑证据，他因枪杀两人（包括他的表弟）而于周三面临处决。
item.description:
A Texas inmate who has long said he’s innocent and claims that his conviction more than 20 years ago was based on false testimony and questionable evidence faces execution Wednesday for fatally shooting two people, including his cousin. https://t.co/vndKYjjcSl pic.twitter.com/7OACLhLlG6

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 当局表示，本月初促使特立尼达和多巴哥宣布全国进入紧急状态的近海漏油事件已经波及数百英里外的荷属加勒比海岛屿博内尔岛海岸。
item.description:
An offshore oil spill that prompted Trinidad and Tobago to declare a national emergency earlier this month has reached the shores of the Dutch Caribbean island of Bonaire hundreds of miles away, authorities said. https://t.co/OrB9WJIPQI

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 温迪公司对有关该连锁餐厅将提高菜单价格的报道予以回击："我们没有这样的计划，也不会在顾客光顾我们最多的时候提高价格。
item.description:
Wendy's is pushing back on reports that the restaurant chain will increase menu prices.

"We have no plans to do that and would not raise prices when our customers are visiting us most."https://t.co/Og2xPvtFmg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 对于有色人种运动员来说，户外运动的世界是难以进入的。接受一项新运动需要跨越一个又一个障碍--尽管挑战重重，但一项研究发现，冬季运动的参与正慢慢变得更加多样化。
item.description:
The world of outdoor recreation is deceptively inaccessible for athletes of color.

Embracing a new sport requires navigating barrier after barrier — despite the challenges, a study found that winter sports participation is slowly getting more diverse. https://t.co/IDty22KFJV

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: "我今天站在你们面前......说这将是我作为参议院共和党领袖的最后一个任期。"参议员米奇-麦康奈尔宣布，在担任共和党参议院领袖十多年后，他将于11月卸任。
item.description:
"I stand before you today ... to say this will be my last term as Republican leader of the Senate."

Sen. Mitch McConnell announced that he's stepping down as Republican Senate leader in November after more than a decade serving in the position. https://t.co/hckcvi1xU6 pic.twitter.com/c2iVNs0TVa

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 南非官员公布的最新数据显示，2023 年全国共有 499 头犀牛被盗猎，比上一年增加了 51 头。
item.description:
New data released by officials in South Africa shows 2023 saw a total of 499 rhinos poached across the country — an increase of 51 from the previous year. https://t.co/F8HIQlzuiP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：参议员米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）宣布，在执掌参议院十多年后，他将于11月卸任参议院共和党领袖一职。"人生最不被人重视的才能之一，就是知道什么时候该迈向人生的下一个篇章。
item.description:
BREAKING: Sen. Mitch McConnell has announced that he will step down as Senate Republican leader in November after more than a decade at the helm.

"One of life's most underappreciated talents is to know when it's time to move on to life's next chapter." https://t.co/0J4QrUT44R pic.twitter.com/iaMGgaHDoH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回了爱达荷州连环杀手托马斯-尤金-克里奇（Thomas Eugene Creech）在最后一刻提出的暂缓执行死刑的请求，为监狱当局对他执行注射死刑扫清了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. Supreme Court has denied Idaho serial killer Thomas Eugene Creech's last-minute request for a stay of execution — clearing the way for prison authorities to carry out his execution by lethal injection. https://t.co/5cPimKOiSz pic.twitter.com/dWo2xitW8J

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 新消息：前总统特朗普的律师打算对其民事欺诈案中 4.64 亿美元的判决只缴纳 1 亿美元的保释金，认为这一处罚 "史无前例"。
item.description:
NEW: Lawyers for former Pres. Trump intend to post a bond of only $100 million against the $464 million judgment in his civil fraud case, arguing the penalty is "unprecedented." https://t.co/XstnAiAg5L

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院上周做出的一项决定导致多家医疗机构停止试管婴儿治疗，引起强烈反响，在此背景下，阿拉巴马州立法者提出了三项旨在保护试管婴儿治疗的新法案。
item.description:
